base_description: A vampire materializes in front of you! He looks hungry...
died_description: You startle backwards as a vampire appears in front of you! You can already feel your blood rushing...

success_condition.description:
You tear the book from your waistcoat as the vampires grin widens, revealing his sharp incisors
You begin reciting esoteric nonsense, and the vampire screams!
After a sharp crack, the vampire is gone, leaving only a key. You feel some of your sanity return

neutral_condition.description:
You tear the cross from your neck, brandishing it like a weapon. The vampire laughs, and in the blink of eye is biting into your neck.
You thrust the cross into his forehead and he screams!
After a sharp crack, the vampire is gone, leaving only a key. You feel drained, but alive.

failure_condition.description: You struggle to find something useful, to no avail. In the blink of an eye the vampire is biting into your neck, and all goes black

base_description: A thug appears from the shadows, how did he get there?! He flashes a knife at you and demands all your valuables
died_description: A thug appears from the shadows, how did he get there?! He flashes a knife and.. looks confused.. then shakes his head and demands all your valuables

success_condition.description:
You fire your revolver at the thugs centre of mass, dropping him. You feel energized, but sickened.
You relieve the man of his knife, and find a curious book in his waistcoat

neutral_condition.description:
You pull out your own knife, hoping to best the thug in a duel.
Alas, you are no knife fighter. While you survived the fight you now resemble a pincushion
You are bleeding, but alive. 
You relieve the man of his knife, and find a curious book in his waistcoat

failure_condition.description:
The request for valuables was a ruse! He's a madman! No matter what you do, the thug decends upon you, and everything goes black.
When you awaken your breathe is wheezy, like you body is covered in holes. Your mind is hazy. You are on deaths door

base_description: Vines snake up from the ground and wrap around you, slowly constricting
died_description: Vines snake up from the ground and wrap around you, you start to thrash and panic with fear

success_condition.description: You successfully cut the vines before you asphyxiate. You feel energized

neutral_condition.description:
You smash the lamp against the vines and yourself, setting you both alight!
As you try to put out the flames the vines shrink back beneath into the dirt.
You are moderately burned and traumatised

failure_condition.description: Whatever you try to do, it doesn't work, and you quickly lose consciousness. When you awaken you find it hard to breathe, but you're alive

base_description:
A curious man stands behind a stall, various trinkets and wares adorn the counter.
The mysterious shopkeeper wishes to make a trade, he says he particularly likes plants.
You dare not insult him with the wrong item
died_description:
A man stands behind a stall, you seem preternaturally unnerved by him for some reason.
The mysterious shopkeeper wishes to make a trade, he says he particularly likes plants.
You dare not insult him with the wrong item

success_condition.description: The man says these cuttings will do quite nicely. In return he gives you a lamp, to 'Light the Way'. You feel confident

neutral_condition.description:
'Theres no telling when one may need to tell the time'
The man takes the trinket and gives you a pocketwatch in return.
You feel uneasy.

failure_condition.description:
The man refuses your offer.
In return for wasting his time he shoots you with a crossbow bolt and vanishes.
Luckily it's only in the shoulder, still hurts though.

base_description: A fog begins to form, moving alarmingly fast in your direction!
died_description: A deathly black fog begins to form, and its coming straight for you. You already find it hard to breathe

success_condition.description: You shine the lamp directly into the fog, as it dissipates you could have sworn you heard a high-pitched squeel

neutral_condition.description:
You take out the book and fumble for a page about death fogs.
You finish reading just as the fog surrounds you and fills your lungs!
As it dissipates you could have sworn you heard a high-pitched squeel

failure_condition.description:
You fumble around for anything that might be of use, but before long you can't see through the fog, and you begin to suffocate.
When you awaken, you find it hard to breathe

base_description: In front of you sits a sturdy wooden chest. It appears to be... eager to see you.
died_description: In front of you sits what looks like a chest... Seems harmless enough, but lets not shoot at it this time.

success_condition.description: You tentatively insert the key into the lock and twist... The lid of the chest creaks open of its own accord. Inside you find a creepy mask.

neutral_condition.description:
You fire the revolver into the locking mechanism on the chest.
The chest immediately explodes, obliterating it and its contents, and sending you flying backwards.
When you come to, you check what remains of the chest, to no avail.
 Your revolver has been destroyed

failure_condition.description:
No matter what you do you can't seem to get the blasted thing open.
You kick the chest in a rage, causing it to growl.
You slowly back away...

base_description:
A tall man stands up from scratching at the dirt and waves you over.
Cautiously, you approach. It appears he's drawn a cross on the ground
'Have you run out of Time yet, or perhaps you have an offering?' he says.
died_description:
A tall man stands up from scratching at the dirt. His hands seems to flicker into claws and back again to human hands.
You feel hollow as you approach him.
'Have you run out of Time yet, or perhaps you have an offering?' he says with a grin.

success_condition.description:
You take out the pocket-watch and hand it to the man.
'Wonderful, wonderful. You may survive after all' The man bows, turns, and walks away into the shadows

neutral_condition.description: You take the bolt and hand it to the man, who takes it eagerly. He gently brushes his fingers over the dried blood covering it. 'This shall do'

failure_condition.description: Having nothing to offer of any interest to the man, he scoffs, turns, and walks away into the shadows.

base_description:
A group of masked revellers are dancing and chanting around a bonfire, it seems like their trying to summon something.
You have a few seconds to do something before someone sees you.
died_description: A group of masked demons scream and dance around a bonfire, they seem to summoning something... big

success_condition.description:
You quickly take out the mask and put it on your face, joining the revellers in their chanting.
Before long a great bellow bursts from the bonfire, and a great demon of flame rises out.
Before you can do anything, the demon quickly snatches up every masked reveller and eats them, including you!
Everything is fire!

neutral_condition.description:
You quickly duck behind a tree and grasp the cross in the hopes it will protect you from whatever this is.
 As the chanting reaches its crescendo, a great bellow bursts from the bonfire, and a great demon of flame rises out.
Before you can do anything, the demon quickly snatches up every masked reveller and eats them, burning them alive!
For some reason the demon doesn't sense you, and after taking care of the revellers, waddles away,
setting fire to everything in its path.

failure_condition.description: Having nothing useful, and realising you need to be as far away from here as possible, you leg it
